name: Outlive
description:
Summary:


Outlive is a first-person survival horror game, set in a post-apocalyptic world after a virus infected most of the population. You are determined to prove that the virus was not an accident, but rather planned and released by the government. You will go out on a journey to find the lab's and collect evidence. The only chance of survival is to use your speed and agility to outsmart your enemies, solve puzzles and make your way to safety after collecting all the evidence.

Developers:


Outlive is more than just a game - it's a labor of great passion created by an indie studio founded by only a father and his son. The father was responsible for the coding and the son was responsible for the level design and gameplay. Join us and support our indie studio's dream. The game was developed since 2019.

Story:


It all started when biohazard safety issues at the state facility prompted the government to shut it down for months, a spokesman told TV News. The statement said the problems date back to several months ago, when a storm destroyed the steam autoclave sterilization plant that processed the waste. There was no biological threat to public health, it was unlikely to spread widely.

But that was not true. The threat spread across the country. Disease and mutation spread among the population. Most channels carried the government's announcement but started studio debates, videos and live broadcasts from the country.

You will play as Peter, who embarks on a journey to prove that the disease and mutations that spread among the population, were not an accident as the news suggested. Peter made his research and though he might know where the government's labs and bases that made the virus were. While traveling on his journey, Peter gets into an accident and has to search in the woods for help, but there was something unexpected waiting to be discovered. In a world where weapons are nonexistent, survive the harsh environment using your observational skill, intelligence, and patience. Will it be enough? That's up to you.

Key Features:


  • Terrifying Enemies: Mutants have no mercy. They can feel your fear and hear your every footstep, you must be fast and agile, use the environment to your advantage and solve any obstacle that comes up during this adventure.
  • You cannot fight: You are left only with your camera and the things you find along the way. Can you outsmart, outrun, hide and escape the Mutants while collecting all the evidence? We will see.
  • Survive and Explore: As you explore the depths of this abandoned ground and underground, you'll come across bone-chilling scenes that will leave you questioning your sanity. Do you have what it takes to face the horrors that lie ahead?
  • Solve the puzzles: Use your skills and the environment to solve and escape deadly traps that may be lurking in the darkness. Just make sure to not become one of them!

Warning:


Outlive contains violence, gore and blood. Hope you enjoy.
